string.value: #p1013000#, the Baby Dragon, seems to be very hungry. But what do Dragon's eat? Ask #b#p1013000##k.

#p1013000# says that he also doesn't know what to eat and asks that you be a good master and find him something to eat. Hmm, what would taste good to a Dragon? You have no idea. Maybe #bDad#k would know. Try asking him.
Dad seems to be a bit confused too.
What is it, Evan? You want to know what Dragons eat? Why do you... Huh? You found a Dragon?\r\n#L0##b(You show #p1013000# to Dad.)#l\n#k

Eh...that's a Dragon? Are you sure it's not just a big lizard? Well, all life is precious, so I guess you can keep it... \r\n#L0##b(Dad doesn't seem to believe that #p1013000# is a Dragon. Well, he is pretty small. Would Dad believe it if he heard #p1013000# talk?)#l\n#k

If it were a real Dragon, it would be too dangerous to keep. What if it breathed fire? I don't really think it's a Dragon, but maybe we should ask an adventurer to come kill it, just in case.\r\n#L0##b(What?! Kill #p1013000#?! But he didn't do anything wrong!!)#l\n#k

Of course, I'm pretty sure it's not a Dragon. Dragons only appear in #m240000000# on the Ossyria Continent. \r\n#L0##bHa... Ha... You're definitely right! I doubt he's a Dragon. He's probably just a lizard! Definitely!#l\n#k

Yeah, I'm pretty sure. It's a bizarre-looking lizard, but it doesn't look dangerous. Guess you can keep it.\r\n#L0##b (For his own safety, you better not let anyone know that #p1013000# is a Dragon.)#l\n#k
Oh, you said you were looking for something to feed the lizard? I'm not sure... Let me think about it for a moment.
Oh, I'm so hungry... Sooo hungry...
